references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 2, 1999; see Example 5.2.3.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 75
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..floor(n/2)} binomial(n, k)*k!*Stirling1(n-k, k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Dec 19 2004
maple: a:= n-> n! *coeff(series((1+x)^x, x, n+1), x, n):seq(a(n), n=0..30);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 12 2012
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x)^x, {x, 0, 19}], x]*Table[(n - 1)!, {n, 1, 20}]a[n_] := (-1)^n*n!*Sum[ StirlingS1[n - k, k]/(n - k)!*(-1)^(n - 2*k), {k, 1, n}]; a[0] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 19}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 12 2012, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ *)
crossrefs: Cf. A053489, A053490. Apart from initial terms and signs, same as A066166.
author: _Simon Plouffe_
